text: The Chats are a punk rock band from Australia. They formed in Sunshine Coast, Queensland in 2016. The band went viral from their song "Smoko" in 2017. == Discography == === Studio albums === * High Risk Behaviour (2020) * Get Fucked (2022) === Extended plays === * The Chats (2016) * Get This In Ya!! (2017) === Singles === * "Smoko" (2017) * "Do What I Want" (2018) * "Pub Feed" (2019) * "Identity Theft" (2019) * "The Clap" (2020) * "Dine N Dash" (2020) * "ACÏŸDC CD" (2020) * "Struck By Lightning" (2022) * "6L GTR" (2022) * "I've Been Drunk In Every Pub in Brisbane" (2022) * "Out On the Street" (2022) == References == == Other websites == * Category:2010s Australian music groups Category:2010s establishments in Australia Category:2016 establishments Category:2020s music groups Category:Australian rock bands Category:Musical groups established in 2016 Category:Musical groups from Queensland Category:Musical trios Category:Punk bands
title: The Chats
